name: Laser Defender version 0.3
description:
Laser Defender version 0.2

Moving keys are:

"A"  for moving left, "D" for moving right, "W" for moving UP, "S" for moving Down.

Left mouse key is for "Fire"

For now the game , have just killing enemies, no boss for now.

If game make loads of visuals, ill develop more.

Hope you like it. Have fun.         

https://www.patreon.com/andreicontact

On Laser Defender version 0.2 , we have a score board. Yeeey ,is not that nice? :)

Laser Defender 0.3 , finally some Health display.
